  • Field Details

    • currentUser

      public static User currentUser
      Store the current logged-in user (Teacher or Student)

  • Constructor Details

    • SystemDatabase

      public SystemDatabase()
      Constructs a new SystemDatabase instance, initializing necessary folders and files. Also creates a default Manager account if none exists.

  • Method Details

    • removeAll

      public static void removeAll()
      Removes all files and directories of the database.

    • login

      public static Account login(String username, String password, AccountType type)
      Logs in an account with the provided username, password, and account type.
      Parameters:
      username - The unique identifier for the user.
      password - The password for the user.
      type - The type of account (STUDENT, TEACHER, or MANAGER).
      Returns:
      An Account object if login is successful, otherwise null.

      Returns:
      A Student object if conversion is successful, otherwise null.

    • getStudentList

      public static ArrayList<Student> getStudentList(String usernameFilter, String nameFilter, String departmentFilter)
      Retrieves a list of students filtered by containing specific substring in username, name, and department.
      Parameters:
      usernameFilter - The filter for student usernames.
      nameFilter - The filter for student names.
      departmentFilter - The filter for student departments.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the filtered list of Student objects.

    • getTeacherList

      public static ArrayList<Teacher> getTeacherList(String usernameFilter, String nameFilter, String departmentFilter)
      Retrieves a list of teachers filtered by containing specific substring in username, name, and department.
      Parameters:
      usernameFilter - The filter for teacher usernames.
      nameFilter - The filter for teacher names.
      departmentFilter - The filter for teacher departments.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the filtered list of Teacher objects.

    • getCourseList

      public static ArrayList<Course> getCourseList(String courseIDFilter, String courseNameFilter, String departmentFilter)
      Retrieves a list of courses filtered by containing specific substring in course ID, course name, and department.
      Parameters:
      courseIDFilter - The filter for course IDs.
      courseNameFilter - The filter for course names.
      departmentFilter - The filter for course departments.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the filtered list of Course objects.

    • registerStudent

      public static String registerStudent(Student student)
      Registers a new student by writing their information to a file.
      Parameters:
      student - The Student object containing the information to be registered.
      Returns:
      An empty string if registration is successful, or an error message if the username already exists.

    • registerTeacher

      public static String registerTeacher(Teacher teacher)
      Registers a new teacher by writing their information to a file.
      Parameters:
      teacher - The Teacher object containing the information to be registered.
      Returns:
      An empty string if registration is successful, or an error message if the username already exists.

    • registerManager

      public static String registerManager(Manager manager)
      Registers a new manager by writing their information to a file.
      Parameters:
      manager - The Manager object containing the information to be registered.
      Returns:
      An empty string if registration is successful, or an error message if the username already exists.

    • createCourse

      public static String createCourse(Course course)
      Creates a new course by writing its information to a file.
      Parameters:
      course - The Course object containing the information to be created.
      Returns:
      An empty string if creation is successful, or an error message if the course ID already exists.
